Name: Shine's Adventures 4 (Nightmare)
About the game: The following is the link to the bundle of'Shine's Adventures'.The bundle will give you more discounts. / (If you don't see the bundle or can't open the link, you can copy the link manually) This is a Roguelike game.There are also some arpg contents. 1 Shine will seek in the maze and kill the demons that destroy the world. 2 The maze is random. There are 20 different rooms in the game, more than 100 props and 10 boss. 3 As an action game, difficulty and flexibility are moderate. 4 Although the maze is random, there are certain rules that will bring about some tactics. 5 After killing the boss, you can still continue the game and get better equipment and get higher scores. ********************************************************************************************************************** If you have 'ShineG Has Nightmares' in your library,I will give you the key of this game.(An account can only receive one key) Please send a screenshot of your account name and library to 'shineproject@163.com' . Please name the theme of E-mail is 'Give me Shine4'. I will give you the key of this game after I confirm it. PS.After receiving the e-mail,I need to apply for this game's keys from Steam.So,it will take me a little time.Please wait patiently.
